code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{addCar}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddCarForm=_ref=>{let{onCarAdded}=_ref;const[brand,setBrand]=useState('');const[vehicleType,setVehicleType]=useState('');const[capacity,setCapacity]=useState('');const[fuelType,setFuelType]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await addCar(brand,vehicleType,fuelType,capacity);setBrand('');setVehicleType('');setFuelType('');setCapacity('');onCarAdded();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Add New Car"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:brand,onChange:e=>setBrand(e.target.value),placeholder:"Brand",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:vehicleType,onChange:e=>setVehicleType(e.target.value),placeholder:"Vehicle Type",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:fuelType,onChange:e=>setFuelType(e.target.value),placeholder:"Fuel Type",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:capacity,onChange:e=>setCapacity(e.target.value),placeholder:"Capacity",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Car"})]});};export default AddCarForm;
